lemma transfer_arrive': assumes "(s, H\<not>K:arrive(m), s') \<in> trans (pnet np n)" and "s \<in> reachable (pnet np n) TT" and "netgmap sr s = netmask (net_tree_ips n) (\<sigma>, \<zeta>)" and "netgmap sr s' = netmask (net_tree_ips n) (\<sigma>', \<zeta>')" and "wf_net_tree n" shows "((\<sigma>, \<zeta>), H\<not>K:arrive(m), (\<sigma>', \<zeta>')) \<in> trans (opnet onp n)"
